name: UNHappy Holidays
description:
Companies try to sell holiday stuff earlier and earlier every year. Now they want to sell it all year round and there's no time left for Christmas. Collect snowballs and fight off the armies of toys and merch as you try to save your small town!

Made for Crocojam #9.

Controls are:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim, left click to shoot
  • Shift to run
  • Pick up items by walking into them.

In the event a wave seems to be taking forever and you think you've got every enemy, shoot some snowballs directly above you, there might be bats!
